jd: From: Rehana, Parin Technologies rehana@parintec.com Reply to: rehana@parintec.com HiPlease share your Updated Resumerehana@parintec.com Title: Business Analyst Location: Atlanta, GAExp: 10+ yearsDuration: 8 monthsREMOTEInterview: Webcam Interview Only Job Description:Seeking a qualified candidate for the position of Business Analyst (BA)to join the client based in Atlanta, Georgia. ResponsibilitiesThe BA serves as the communication catalysts, ensuring that agency business stakeholders and NextGen solution teams are in sync. The BA will serve as a facilitator to resolve business process issues and successfully deliver established project schedules and closing timelines.Job DutiesAt the direction of the Project Manager the BA will:Establish Stakeholder RegisterAssisting in scheduling and facilitating agency project meetingsAssist stakeholders take the necessary actions/steps to achieve the goals and objectives of the project.Assists in coordinating project activitiesAssists in developing test plansAssists stakeholders with test scripts·Documents and distributes meeting minutes·Identifies and defines business requirements by quickly understanding business process requirements based on the input and opinions of a diverse group of users·Works closely with Project manager to maintain project artifacts·Develops and maintains a productive working relationship with project sponsors, vendors, and key clients.·Documents agency business requirements in a suitable format that communicates the specific actions developed for the product and obtains appropriate approvals.Qualifications·Bachelor’s Degree·7 years’ working as a BA or 3 years’ BA experience and a BA certification·Expert in the use of MS O365 applications·Strong interpersonal and written communication skills·Ability to work well with business unit SMEs, other PMs/BAs, vendors, and end users in cross-functional teams·Possesses a broad understanding of IT and business skills·Extremely detail-oriented, organized, structured, analytical, and logical, with strong problem-solving skills.·Experience working with government organizations --Thanks & Regards,Rehana RemoTechnical Recruiter E: Rehana@parintec.com M: +1 (551) 353-4812 https://www.linkedin.com/in/rehana-begum-7b58a32a3/--------------------------------------------------------------------------8578842a8/Parin Technologies LLC| https://www.parintec.com/111 Town Square Place, Suite 1203, Jersey City, NJ 07310, USA
